landing.tag: I create things for the Web.

contact.title: Contact
contact.info: Send me a message about your desired project. Please include as much detail as possible.
contact.greet: I'm looking forward to hear from you!
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.error: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again.
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully. I will get in touch with you shortly.
contact.invalidToken: Failed to pass validation. Please refresh the page.
contact.privacy: Your privacy is important to me. I will only use your information to respond to your inquiry. I do not share your data with third parties.
